Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hey there, can you send me my API token - I need it for my tracking software

Hi Paolo! I can't send you your API token directly, but I can guide you on how to fetch it. Please log in to the Newsbreak Admanager Platform, then click on Tools - Resources - API Access Tokens. From there, you can click 'Generate token' to create your own API access token. Remember, this token is tied to your user ID and should not be shared with anyone else.
Hey there, can you connect me to a support agent?
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.
Can you increase our payment threshold - we're getting to many charges on our card

The billing threshold automatically adjusts based on your payment history and spending. If you have concerns about the frequency of charges, I recommend reaching out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for assistance. They can help review your account and provide guidance.
How can I add team members?

To add team members to your organization or ad account, follow these steps:

1. **Organization Access**:
   - Go to Account Management.
   - Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization.
   - Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
   - Fill in the email address of the new user and their organization role (Admin or Employee) and submit.

2. **Ad Account Access**:
   - Switch over to the 'Ad Accounts' tab in Account Management.
   - Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Ad account.
   - Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
   - Fill in the email address of the new user and their Ad account role (Admin, Operator, or Viewer) and submit.

Once submitted, the new user will receive an email prompt to verify their account. After verification, they will see your Organization or Ad account listed under their own Account Management tab.
